subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Bruins beat Stanford, 67-64, by piddling away a lead in the final minutes, then watching as an opposing player missed a potential game-tying shot at the buzzer.
snippet: The Bruins beat Stanford, 67-64, by piddling away a lead in the final minutes, then watching as an opposing player missed a potential game-tying shot at the buzzer.
